meanings: (신경 쓰다, 걱정하다) [동사] care (about), mind, be bothered (about)

vlive.korean: 피부 톤이랑은 상관이 없다고요? It doesn't matter with the skin tone? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 다시 럽하👋
vlive.english: It doesn't matter with the skin tone?

vlive.korean: 래퍼랑 무슨... - 그게 무슨 상관이야? A rapper... - What does that have to do with anything? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: A rapper... - What does that have to do with anything?

vlive.korean: 상관없어요? 옆으로? It doesn't matter? Slice it sideways? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: It doesn't matter? Slice it sideways?

vlive.korean: 상관도 없는 애한테 뭐가 그렇게 궁금한데? Then why is it bugging you so much? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 너무 좋아해서 짝사랑만 하는 거 이해됨? [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.04

vlive.english: Oh, hang on. Will it be okay to say this?
